definition: to go out to sea/to enter the sea (to swim etc)/(fig.) to take the plunge (e.g. leave a secure job, or enter prostitution etc)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
see 誇海口|夸海口[kua1 hai3 kou3]

sentences.english: There’s no doubt that law schools have overbuilt and that the legal profession has overpromised.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，法学院过多了，并对法定职业夸下海口。

sentences.english: My classmate has made lots of money since he quit his job and ventured into business last year.
sentences.chinese: 我同学去年辞职下海经商后挣了大钱。

sentences.english: To catch the dragon tiger mountain to the sea.
sentences.chinese: 擒龙要下海，打虎要上山。

sentences.english: Bill will promise you the moon, but he won't live up to his promises.
sentences.chinese: 比尔会为你夸下海口，但他是不会兑现承诺的。

sentences.english: He'll need to sharpen his brain a bit if he hopes to get on in business.
sentences.chinese: 如果他想下海经商，他还得头脑更精明些。

sentences.english: I must go down to the seas again, to the vagrant gypsy life.
sentences.chinese: 我得重下海去，生活像漂泊的吉卜赛人一样。

sentences.english: You'd have gone straight to the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 带着这个掉下海会直接沉底的。

sentences.english: In order to make a fortune, I have several friends of the sea, when the individual vendors.
sentences.chinese: 为了发财我的几个朋友都下海了，当了个体商贩。

sentences.english: In small qian alone, in the mountain thief, entanglement between pushed the sea.
sentences.chinese: 就在小倩孤身一人之际，遇上山贼，纠缠间被推下海。

sentences.english: Here and there children ventured into the water, despite official warnings to stay out of the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 虽然官方有警戒不要下海，还是有冒险下水的小孩。

sentences.english: Bill wil promise you the moon, but he won't live up to his promises.
sentences.chinese: 比尔会为你夸下海口，但他是不会兑现承诺的。

sentences.english: There are a lot of good reasons for young entrepreneurs to get an early jump and start their businesses in college.
sentences.chinese: 青年企业家早日下海并在大学创业的原因有很多。

sentences.english: But go into business begins to make car sale at the beginning of 90 time, epigenesis stands numerous sincere car.
sentences.chinese: 但90年代初开始下海做汽车销售，后成立众诚汽车。

sentences.english: He had boasted loudly, but he could not carry out his threats.
sentences.chinese: 虽然他夸下海口，但却未能如其所愿。

definition: to go out to sea/(neologism) to expand into overseas markets
